value:
What do I want for my winter festival
gift? Would a good partner to take
care of me be too much to ask for?

I grew up in the alleys of Enbarr,
begging for coins, eating scraps...
I never thought much about festivals.

This is a time for us to forget about
barriers of status that divide us, and
celebrate what brings us together.

Worried about the chill? Sing a song
with me. You'll warm right up!

I'd like it if Edie and Hubie could find
an opportunity to relax at this year's
winter festival...

Hi there! I've got a special invitation
for you: a winter festival over at
$Nf's castle!

If I can play even a small part in
making people happy, I'll gladly
do it.

Come on, brighten up! It's the most
wonderful time of the year!

This frigid air is wreaking havoc on
my poor throat...

A gift? For me? How delightful!
I'll treat it with care.

Today I am no mere songstress—I am
a winter envoy! May the seasonal
festivities begin!

I wasn't happy about being made to
play the role of winter envoy, to tell
the truth, $Nu.$k$pI didn't want to step into another role
so soon after retiring from the stage.
I wanted to be myself for a while.$k$pOn top of that, I wasn't even sure I
was qualified. What do I really have
to offer, anyway?$k$pI'm not noble born. I'm not rich.
I'm not particularly witty. I can't
even fight as well as most here.$k$pBut as soon as I saw how even my
humble gifts were putting smiles on
faces, my fears were put to rest.$k$pI'm glad to take part in this festival,
not as an actress, but as a human
being. Thank you for inviting me.
The stars twinkle above…
Sing along!
This'll be fun.
Just for you!
It's all ruined...
I'll sing you a carol!
Come on, get up!
You want me to play the part of winter envoy? I'm retired from the stage.
*gasp* You must be freezing. Let's get you warmed up!
The whole town looks like it's sparkling. It's positively gorgeous.
Hmm... Where has Manuela gotten to? It would be lovely to sing with her.
It's been absolutely lovely spending this evening with you.
Yes.
Chilly, isn't it?
Ready to go.
